cleaned_text: Join Dr. Raja Sivamani and guest Ellen Meredith. With more than 35 years of hands-on experience, Ellen shares her style of energy work, called "energy dialogue". This method focuses on learning to dialogue skillfully with the body's energies and to support holistic healing of mind, body, and spirit. Sometimes unfamiliar terms can be off-putting and many people have a hard time opening their mind to new perspectives. For others, new ideas on health and wellness are exciting. Science tells us that our bodies are formed and fueled by energy, which comes in many forms. Tune in to learn what you can do for yourself to stay whole and healthy.
